remarks: Ordered pair membership in an ordered pair class abstraction, with a reduced hypothesis.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 29-May-2011.)
statement:
opelopab3.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopab3.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opelopab3.3 $e |- ( ch -> A e. C ) $.
opelopab3 $p |- ( B e. D -> ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
